name: regionalimprovementforstandardsandexcellence.cypresstests
description: The Cypress tests are designed to run against the front-end of the application. To set up the tests, you need to provide a configuration file named `cypress.env.json` with the following information:

scripts.cy:run: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser edge
scripts.cy:smoke: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser edge --spec cypress/e2e/*
scripts.cy:zap: npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser electron
scripts.generate:html:report: npm run combine:reports && npm run create:html:report
scripts.format: npm run prettier:write && npm run lint
scripts.format:check: npm run prettier:check && npm run lint
